Posts.Content: Jan 20, 2017 03:30PM lioness37 wrote: I am getting my biopsy on Monday, the hospital just called and said they are putting a clip in my breast. Now I am even more nervous!!!! Why don't they fully explain these things to you up front? I feel like they purposely withhold information. I'm worried that this clip will cause me pain since I already have pain on the let side of my body due to a pinched nerve.
